text: Phir yeh jannat ke log dozakh walon se pukar kar kahenge, “ humne un sarey waadon ko theek paa liya jo hamare Rubb ne humse kiye thay, kya tumne bhi un waadon ko theek paya jo tumhare Rubb ne kiye thay?” Woh jawab denge “haan” tab ek pukarne wala unke darmiyan pukarega ke “ khuda ki laanat un zalimon par
